issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
For sub module: activemq-jms-pool have duplicated JTA spec in pom.
Both geronimo-jta_1.1_spec:jar:1.1.1:compile and geronimo-jta_1.0.1B_spec:jar:1.0.1:compile presents.

Here is the output for "mvn dependency:tree"
